title: Britney Spears raves about connecting with 'Mother Nature' as she shares snap of Maui trip
text:
She recently returned back from an enviable trip to Maui, Hawaii.

And Britney Spears took to social media to reflect over how much she enjoyed connecting with Mother Nature while she was there.

The 37-year-old shared a shot of herself sitting in a tree while at the beach to encourage her 22.8 million followers on Monday.

Bringing it back to nature! Britney Spears reflected on Mother Nature on Monday when she took to social media to share a photo of herself sitting in a tree from her recent trip to Maui, Hawaii

'Nothing heals more than the ocean,' she began the lengthy reflective post.

'I always feel so alive when I see the ocean in Maui .... it’s literally turquoise ... it’s unbelievable!!!'

'This pic does not do justice at all for I saw there. In a world where we are all subjected to cell phones and devices .... we get hung up on screens instead of Mother Nature and listening to her.'

Feeling alive! 'I always feel so alive when I see the ocean in Maui .... it’s literally turquoise ... it’s unbelievable !!!'

Britney continued: 'Mother Nature is everything. I find her every time I go to this magical place ..... here I know there is more.'

The Baby One More Time singer stunned in a white cotton mini dress for the beach day outing.

She styled her new brunette tresses out into loose waves and accessorised with shades over her eyes.

Britney gushed over Maui in a personal post last week while posing in a yoga studio.

'So I found this adorable simple yoga studio in Maui ... I tried to start off by doing yoga but I danced the first 20 minutes and let go,' she penned.

Vacation time: Britney gushed over Maui in a personal post last week while posing in a yoga studio

'I finished with stretching, splits and yoga! Most of the year I did a lot of heat yoga, and I over did it. I prefer cardio and dancing now !!!'

Britney continued to explain that while her vacation was great, she lost much of the footage off of her phone and was 'extremely upset.'

'My trip to Maui was amazing, but I lost 7 hours of footage because my phone didn’t have a back up plan. I was extremely upset.'

'I had 3 outside videos and 7 pics and hotel footage ... but anyhow ... I kept moving forward !!! Oh, and at night the studio had baby twinkle lights .. I preferred nights ... it was magical.'

Britney's vacation comes amid her recent break from the spotlight.

Taking a break: Britney's vacation comes amid her recent break from the spotlight (pictured 2018)

Drama: There has also been much family drama over the past few months regarding her conservatorship and custody over her sons, Sean, 14, and Jayden, 13 (pictured with sons in 2017)

The mom-of-two took to social media last month and asked her fans not to forget about her.

'I hope y'all haven't forgotten about me!!! I'm taking this transition in my life to focus on what I really want ... I've been working nonstop, well, since I was 8 years old in the business. Sometimes it's good to stop and reflect !!!! Miss you all ... I really do have the best fans in the world !!! #fbf,' she wrote with a couple of throwback photos.

Back in January, she called off her Domination shows in Las Vegas due to her father's illness.

Her rep released a statement calling it 'an indefinite work hiatus' before adding: 'She has made this decision to devote all of her time to her family and their efforts to care for her father during his recovery from a recent life-threatening illness.'

There has also been much family drama over the past few months regarding her conservatorship and custody over her sons, Sean, 14, and Jayden, 13.
